
---
title: "Provider"
title_tag: "Resource Provider | Package splunk"

---



<!-- WARNING: this file was generated by Pulumi Docs Generator. -->
<!-- Do not edit by hand unless you're certain you know what you are doing! -->

The provider type for the splunk package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration
settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource
construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the
[documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.




## Create a Provider Resource {#create}

            title="Optional">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>

    </dt>

<h2 id="package-details">Package Details</h2>
<dl class="package-details">
	<dt>Repository</dt>
	<dd><a href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-splunk">https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-splunk</a></dd>
	<dt>License</dt>
	<dd>Apache-2.0</dd>
	<dt>Notes</dt>
	<dd>This Pulumi package is based on the [`splunk` Terraform Provider](https://github.com/splunk/terraform-provider-splunk).</dd>
</dl>
